enterMobileNumberScreen.title: My number

enterUsernameScreen.title: My username

enterNameScreen.title: My name is
enterNameScreen.description: This will be shown on your profile. You can edit your profile at any time.

welcomeLibryScreen.title: Welcome to Libry

publishFirstIdeaScreen.title: Publish your first Idea
publishFirstIdeaScreen.descriptionTop: Ideas are like emails you send out to the world.
publishFirstIdeaScreen.descriptionMiddle:
We’ve created an “Announcements” collection on
 your profile to help you post your first Idea.

publishFirstIdeaScreen.descriptionBottom: You can always edit or delete things later.
